messages.text: Yeah, just the same old legal processes. It's kind of boring to be honest. I don't understand how compliance deals with it.
Fine! I'm really good at those contracts anyways. It's always the same thing if you think about it.
Well, I haven't finished up the contract for the new Towerskill distribution, maybe you could wrap it up for me? :wink:
That would be great, thanks! Anything I can do for you?
I can ask him to move the meeting if you want? I'm always here
I've told him before I can't meet after four, and yet he continues to plan important meetings when I'm away
Oh yeah I just saw, five o'clock tonight. I can't make that! He always does this, it's so annoying
I know, it's because he wants to brainstorm with us once we're up to date. I think the meeting is scheduled for tonight actually, let me check
Daniel can we talk about what Bob asked us to look over? I checked it out and there isn't any information on the new sale protocol
sounds good
Alright guys, i’m happy you’re excited. I will send you all the relevant documents very soon.
I will I will. It's so fun to work together because we have such good chemistry
That works for me as well. just make sure that you are on time.
That's a great thought. James I don't know how busy you are but I can free up the rest of tomorrow to work on this?
Shouldn’t be more than 3 hours on location. You will need to prepare for it a little bit though because management will be there and this can be a great opportunity to argue subliminally for a raise!
I'm down if you're down James! How long will it take/
That would be great! I need more cash! Daniel what do you say ?
You guys are having a great day. maybe you can take control of the seminar next week for the first year associates? You’ll get a small bonus if you accept
Sure give me like ten minutes I'll have it for you
I have to look into it I completely forgot
James, can you forward me the e-mail from two weeks ago?
Haha I appreciate it guys. I’ll let you know
That sounds like a great deal to me!
John we should switch for a week. I'll fly back to London in your place and you can start selling advil to my big accounts!
Hahaha I appreciate that daniel. I haven’t sold anything in 3 years, I should get back on the grind
John taught me, he's the best!
that doesn't even surprise me. he's not that nice of a guy but he's the best teacher I've ever had
Most likely. I heard Daniel came from the new york office in the past and had some of the best sales the company has ever seen
Yeah, I can’t really tell you guys exactly but they’re struggling. I don’t think it’s their fault I think it’s the market that’s flatlining
I actually heard their numbers weren't that good? Is that right John?
Those are some serious salesmen. how are their numbers?
No way? twenty years? that's insane
I know, I know. but they have excellent tema chemistry. Both of them have been working in sales for twenty years. they’re the best in the business
Aw, poor London. It's such an old office, I understand their frustration.
Well, I thought so, but it turns out I have to go back to London to oversee the office. They have a bad life out there.
John are you in town for the whole week?
John, helpful as always!
That would be super helpful! Thank you!
Let me know when you’re done with the proposal and I can have it sent to legal
thanks
Yeah I have notes, I can send them to you on here
I agree. maybe john will be able to do something, as he said. Are you ready for the meeting?
I like that too, but I wish we had higher pay. that way I would be really motivated
Yes, that's frustrating. However, the research center gives us great products to sell and helps attract new clients. I like that.
Yes, but the big money doesn't really go to us. It goes to the research center.
I know, but if it goes through it will bring the firm big money. And if the salesman bring in big money, they can't complain.
Um, i still have some things I need to figure out. This has taken me such a long time. It's kind of a shit project to be honest.
James, how is your project coming along? do you need me for comments?
Duly noted. I will be reaching out to you guys over the next couple of weeks to figure this out
Same, I love selling but I want to make this an ever better company. Team chemistry is great and so are corporate events, but everything else needs some work.
Let me know if you need our help. We'd love to help change things around here.
Okay, I understand. I will tell management all your problems. Maybe we can change some things.
Me neither. To be honest John if there was a better work environment and the same low salary I might consider it. But both being as they are I really can't.
I agree. My salary isn't high enough for me to start working even more hours. And I know we keep saying it but the office equipment isn't good so I don't like spending time here.
There is no way. Pay is low enough as it is, i don't want to be working any more for that kind of money.
I would like to see longer hours from you guys though. Do you think that would work?
For sure. I can tell that you and daniel get along well just by talking to you guys
Most likely. There is a great vibe around the office, despite the fact that the equipment is terrible
I have the same on my end. Everyone loves what we're selling and our team. It's because our team chemistry is so good. I think people can tell that we get along well when they do business with us.
Great, my clients love our products. They've told me that their lives have changed since they switched to us. That's really satisfying.
How are your accounts?
Don’t worry, I’m talking to management as we speak to get them to change something about that. All the offices have said that the office isn’t great
I like all the events they organize, they're so much fun! the office just isn't good enough
I love it! I just told you ! Working here has been the best work experience ever. I love to sell, and this company lets me do that on a daily basis. I value that
Yeah I need an increase in salary too. I've had great results and have enjoyed my work very much. What about you guys? Do you like it here?
But the salary is too low
That’s what everyone has been saying. I agree that the corporate events are great
I'm back from break. Thanks for all the nice messages. I've been very happy working here, but the office supplies are not great. The salary is also too low
Hey guys !
Thanks!
Hmm...I'll take note
Yeah, that’s something that I value a lot. I’ve had quite a bit of success by following that strategy
Same. I think it's crucial for business
Yeah, big accounts are really cool. I had great relationships with all of mine
Yeah, I'm talking to all my biggest accounts to promote the introduction of Advil, I can't wait! They are great people
Do you have a busy day today?
Okay, for sure! I appreciate the team as well.
Cool, I appreciate it. Maybe you could tell them that they are doing a great job with team chemistry too, I really like that
I’ll be sure to bring it up to them when I go over there
Exactly! I can barely talk to my colleagues on skype anymore without being interrupted because of packet loss!
Yes, the printer is pretty bad and so is the internet. Or at least that’s what the San Francisco team told me
Do you think you could tell them that we need better office supplies?
Thanks John! We couldn't do it without your leadership!
I’ll make sure to tell the management of your success, along with James'
Yeah, you did a great job too Daniel! I talked to your big account who said you were a pleasure to work with
He's super client oriented. I guess we can say it here because he deserves the encouragement
Yeah, he made really good use of his clients
He sold 15% more than all of us didn't he? That's insane
Yeah, he just stepped outside to call his family. He’s really excited about his amazing week last week
I think he's out on break?
I love you guys too! James has been doing such good work
The hours are a little too long, but I love working with my team!
I am tired as well! Productive week but can't wait to be home
<@U1E645U2C|danielmorris> has joined the channel
Working out of town tonight...excited for the weekend
<@U1E67QP5M|jameschan> has joined the channel
<@U1E61C1S4|johnrussell> set the channel purpose: New York Sales Office
<@U1E61C1S4|johnrussell> has joined the channel
